+    else:
+        xmin_bound, xmax_bound = (x1, x2) if x1 <= x2 else (x2, x1)

+    # Code for most common case: cubic interpolation of 2 points

+    d1 = g1 + g2 - 3 * (f1 - f2) / (x1 - x2)
